searchDocs.title: GetTouchingParts​
searchDocs.content: </> Zone:GetTouchingParts() → {BasePart } Method to return an array of all BaseParts currently touching this Zone. Works for both Box-style and Part-style Zones

searchDocs.title: Step​
searchDocs.content: </> Zone:Step( DeltaTime: number-- RunService event DeltaTime. ) → () Method that can be called manually in a custom RunService event to step the Zone's detection logic Only present if ManualStepping Config is true and the holder type is a group, if not, this method is removed

searchDocs.content: </> Zone:InGroup( GroupName: string-- Name of the group to check ) → boolean Method to return whether the Zone is in the group or not

searchDocs.title: ZoneConfig​
searchDocs.content: public_types </> interface ZoneConfig { DetectionCoverage: Enum.DetectionCoverage? DetectionMethod: Enum.DetectionMethod? DetectionMode: Enum.DetectionMode? Simulation: Enum.Simulation? Execution: Enum.Execution? Bounds: Enum.Bounds? Rate: Enum.Rate? NoZonePartPropertyListening: boolean? NoZonePartAddedListening: boolean? ManualStepping: boolean? }

searchDocs.title: ZoneContainer​
searchDocs.content: public_types </> type ZoneContainer = (Model | Folder | BasePart | {BasePart } | {[string]: BasePart } | ZoneBoxes) A type of Zone "Part". Instanceless representation of a single Zone Box

searchDocs.title: ZoneBox​
searchDocs.content: private_types </> type ZoneBox = { CFrame: CFrame , Size: Vector3 } A type of Zone "Part". Instanceless representation of a single Zone Box

searchDocs.title: ZoneBoxs​
searchDocs.content: private_types </> type ZoneBoxs = {ZoneBox} An array of ZoneBoxes. Useful to create multiple, instanceless Zone boxes as one container

searchDocs.content: </> Zoner.NewFromContainer( ZoneContainer: ZoneContainer,-- Boundaries of the zone. ZoneConfig: ZoneConfig?-- Optional zone tuning configs. ) → Zone-- The constructed zone object. Creates a new Zone from a part, model, folder, config, or a list of zone boxes.
